resources.string: Please choose from the available options

This application is a general calculator application that can calculate area and perimeter of flat shapes, temperature conversion, distance, weight.

This application created for Assessment 1 Mobpro Mini Project.

Area and Perimeter of Flat Shapes
Please select the temperature type and enter the number you want to calculate, remember that the result will be rounded up and to the nearest integer.
